channel.title: Incident Response on Proftsec
channel.description: Recent content in Incident Response on Proftsec

item.title: The Rise of Medusa Ransomware: What Students and Organizations Need to Know
item.description: A breakdown of the recent Medusa ransomware alert, how it impacts everyday users, and how students and professionals can learn from it through hands-on cybersecurity practices.

item.title: Digital Forensics & Incident Response Lab
item.description: Perform forensic investigations, extract system artifacts, and analyze digital evidence.
